payload_json.capacity_guardrail_statement: Any strategic move must reduce owner interrupts before adding new commitments.

asymmetric_moves.move: Offer two reliability promise windows instead of open-ended timelines.
asymmetric_moves.why_now: It narrows decision churn and sets clearer customer expectations.
asymmetric_moves.capacity_check: Capacity fit: only launch if daily exception count stays below owner escalation threshold.

asymmetric_moves.move: Package every job handoff with one standard pre-dispatch brief.
asymmetric_moves.why_now: It lowers repeated clarifications and protects execution consistency.
asymmetric_moves.capacity_check: Load fit: keep owner handoff prep under 45 minutes per day.

asymmetric_moves.move: Narrow offerings to high-clarity work where delivery reliability is strongest.
asymmetric_moves.why_now: Focused offers reduce firefighting and improve follow-through.
asymmetric_moves.capacity_check: Capacity fit: hold weekly committed jobs within current crew completion range.

rejected_load_increasing_moves: Adding new service lines before handoff reliability is stable.
Expanding territory while owner interruptions remain high.
Launching campaigns that require daily owner response triage.
